capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry Potter the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid's lineage is actually quite interesting. Apparently, he's a wizard, which isn't surprising given his whole gamekeeper thing at Hogwarts. But what's really cool is that he's got this unique heritage that sets him apart from everyone else. I'm pretty sure of it, so I'd say Hagrid's lineage as a wizard is definitely confirmed.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of you before, but i'm so excited to learn more about you, hagrid!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of someone called full of beards before, can you tell me more about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow out so much over the years. It's become quite iconic, really. I mean, who else can pull off a face full of beards and still manage to look like a lovable giant?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. alicia, what kind of spell does hagrid cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident in his own age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of neville before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and he told me that his belongings are actually a toad. Can you believe that? I'm not sure what's more surprising, the fact that he owns a toad or that he considers it part of his possessions! I'm pretty certain about this, though - I've seen him with the little guy in tow before.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of a toad before, alicia! can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and he told me that his belongings are actually a toad. Can you believe it? I'm not sure what's more surprising, the fact that Neville has a toad as a possession or the fact that he's willing to share that with me.
